text: The Polar Express is a 2004 American computer animated musical fantasy movie directed by Robert Zemeckis. It was produced by Tom Hanks. It is based on the book, The Polar Express. It stars Tom Hanks, Daryl Sabara, Eddie Deezen, Jimmy Bennett, Steven Tyler, Nona Gaye, and Michael Jeter. It was released on November 12, 2004. This also marks the final appearance of Michael Jeter, who died years before its release, and was dedicated to his memory. == References == Category:2004 computer-animated movies Category:2004 comedy movies Category:2004 musical movies Category:2004 fantasy movies Category:American animated movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American musical movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Zemeckis
title: The Polar Express (movie)
